info.title: GS Hackathon API
info.description: API documentation for GS Hackathon backend with TOTP authentication

cookieAuth.name: auth_token
cookieAuth.description: JWT token stored in HTTP-only cookie

totpConfirmed.description: Whether user has confirmed TOTP setup

profileFillPercentage.description: Percentage of profile fields filled (name, surname, email)

totpConfirmed.description: Whether user has confirmed TOTP setup

totpSecret.description: TOTP secret in base32 format for QR code generation

isAccepted.description: Whether team has been accepted by admins
Whether team is accepted by admin

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all users (Admin only)

delete.description: Delete a user from the system (Admin only)

400.description: Invalid user ID or attempting to delete own account

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all hackathons (Admin only)

post.description: Create a new hackathon (Admin only)

description.example: A machine learning competition focusing on classification problems

rules.example: Teams must submit solutions by the deadline...

400.description: Validation failed or invalid hackathon ID

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of teams for a specific hackathon (Admin only)

get.summary: Get survey questions for a hackathon
get.description: Retrieve all survey questions configured for a hackathon (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a survey question from a hackathon (Admin only)

get.summary: Get team details with survey responses
get.description: View team with all member survey responses (Admin only)

post.description: Mark a team as accepted (Admin only)

post.description: Mark a team as rejected (Admin only)
Creates a new user and returns TOTP secret for Google Authenticator setup

400.description: Invalid request or username already exists

post.description: Verifies TOTP code to confirm registration and activate account

400.description: Invalid request or user already confirmed

post.description: Authenticates user with username and TOTP code, returns JWT in HTTP-only cookie

401.description: Invalid credentials or user not confirmed

post.description: Clears the authentication cookie

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's information including profile fill percentage

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information (name, surname, email)

400.description: Validation failed or email already in use

post.description: Upload a resource file for a hackathon (organizer/admin only)

400.description: Invalid hackathon ID or no file uploaded

post.description: Upload a file that will be provided to participants (organizer/admin only)

400.description: Invalid hackathon ID or no file uploaded

post.description: Upload a file for a hackathon submission (participant only)

fileFormatId.description: File format ID to validate against

400.description: Invalid request, file extension/size validation failed

403.description: Not authorized to upload files for this hackathon

404.description: Hackathon or file format not found

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of teams for hackathon management (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve paginated leaderboard showing team rankings based on best submission scores

currentUserTeamRank.description: Rank of the current user's team (if authenticated)

autoScoringEnabled.description: Whether auto-scoring is enabled for this hackathon

404.description: Hackathon not found or user not in any team

Returns general platform statistics including active challenges, registered users, total prize pool, daily submissions, and category breakdown

trend.description: Percentage change compared to last month
Percentage change compared to last month

value.description: Sum of prizes from active and upcoming hackathons (in dollars)

trend.description: Percentage change compared to last month

post.description: Create a draft submission for a hackathon (team member only)

403.description: Not part of an accepted team

get.summary: Get all submissions for a hackathon

403.description: Not authorized to view all submissions

post.description: Finalize a submission by setting sendAt timestamp (team member only)

400.description: Validation failed or submission already sent

put.description: Persist draft submission files so the team can return later

403.description: Not authorized to edit this submission

post.description: Re-run automatic scoring for all submissions in a hackathon (organizer/admin/judge only)

200.description: Rejudge scoring triggered for all submissions

post.description: Analyze a specific Python file in submission and get AI-generated hints from ChatGPT (team member only)

pythonFile.description: Path to the Python file to analyze (must end with .py)

line.description: Line number where the issue occurs

hints.description: Array of AI-generated hints with line numbers

400.description: Invalid submission ID, pythonFile not provided, or file too large (>10KB)

403.description: Not authorized to get assistance for this submission

500.description: Internal server error or OpenAI API not configured

description.example: CSV file containing the training dataset

404.description: File format or hackathon not found
